mapper.select: select a.id, to_char(a.created,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') as created, a.created_id, concat(coalesce(b.last_name,''),coalesce(b.first_name,'')) as created_name, to_char(a.modified,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') as modified, a.modified_id, concat(coalesce(c.last_name,''),coalesce(c.first_name,'')) as modified_name, a.describe_id, a.describe_question, a.describe_question_keyword, a.describe_question_score_keyword, a.describe_question_score_word, a.describe_question_sort from internal_exams_duolingo_describe_question a left join auth_user b on a.created_id = b.id left join auth_user c on a.modified_id = c.id where a.describe_id = #{describe_id} order by a.describe_question_sort
mapper.insert: insert into internal_exams_duolingo_describe_question ( created, created_id, modified, modified_id, describe_id, describe_question, describe_question_keyword, describe_question_score_keyword, describe_question_score_word, describe_question_sort ) values ( now(), #{created_id}, now(), #{modified_id}, #{describe_id}, #{describe_question}, #{describe_question_keyword}, #{describe_question_score_keyword}, #{describe_question_score_word}, #{describe_question_sort} )
mapper.update: update internal_exams_duolingo_describe_question set modified = now(), modified_id = #{modified_id}, describe_question = #{describe_question}, describe_question_keyword = #{describe_question_keyword}, describe_question_score_keyword = #{describe_question_score_keyword}, describe_question_score_word = #{describe_question_score_word}, describe_question_sort = #{describe_question_sort} where id = #{id}
